channel.title: TOR:SCR on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in TOR:SCR on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Strathcona Raises MEG Bid to Block Deal Made With Cenovus
item.description: Strathcona Resources Ltd. increased its bid for oil sands producer MEG Energy Corp., seeking to break up the oil sands producer’s sale to larger Canadian rival Cenovus Energy Inc.

item.title: Strathcona Raises MEG Bid to Block Deal Made With Cenovus
item.description: Strathcona Resources Ltd. increased its bid for oil sands producer MEG Energy Corp., seeking to break up the oil sands producer’s sale to larger Canadian rival Cenovus Energy Inc.

item.title: Cenovus to Buy MEG Energy in $5 Billion Oil-Sands Deal
item.description: Cenovus Energy Inc. agreed to buy MEG Energy Corp. for C$6.93 billion ($5 billion), topping a rival offer from Strathcona Resources Ltd. in a bid to boost its position among Canada’s largest oil produ

item.title: Cenovus to Buy MEG Energy in $5 Billion Oil-Sands Deal
item.description: Cenovus Energy Inc. agreed to buy MEG Energy Corp. for C$6.93 billion ($5 billion), topping a rival offer from Strathcona Resources Ltd. in a bid to boost its position among Canada’s largest oil produ

item.title: Strathcona Plans Special Dividend If Takeover of MEG Fails
item.description: Strathcona Resources Ltd. plans to issue a special dividend and increase the liquidity of shares traded should the company’s takeover attempt of MEG Energy Corp. fall through.

item.title: Strathcona Plans Special Dividend If Takeover of MEG Fails
item.description: Strathcona Resources Ltd. plans to issue a special dividend and increase the liquidity of shares traded should the company’s takeover attempt of MEG Energy Corp. fall through.
